com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function.result

Interface ScenarioResult<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the individual results
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CurrencyValuesArray, DefaultScenarioResult, FxConvertibleList

    public interface ScenarioResult<T>
    A container for multiple results produced by performing a single calculation across multiple scenarios.

    This class is intended to be used as the return value from the execute method of implementations of CalculationSingleFunction and CalculationMultiFunction.

    The number of results is required to be the same as the number of scenarios in the market data provided to the function.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T get(int index)
      Returns the result at the specified index.
      int size()
      Returns the number of results.
      Stream<T> stream()
      Returns a stream of the results.
